title: Bobby Shares An Update on His Medical Condition + Creepy or Legit: Amy Runs Into Man in Women’s Bathroom + We Talk To Someone Who Was At The House Where A Monkey Allegedly Bit Someone on Halloween
itunes:title: Bobby Shares An Update on His Medical Condition + Creepy or Legit: Amy Runs Into Man in Women’s Bathroom + We Talk To Someone Who Was At The House Where A Monkey Allegedly Bit Someone on Halloween
description:
Bobby shares an update on the cyst in his wrist and the procedure he had done on it yesterday that put him back into a brace. Amy shares a story about seeing a man in the women’s bathroom and wondering if it was actually an accident or he was being creepy. We talked to the videographer for the woman being accused of biting someone at her home on Halloween. We also play a round of the Bobby Feud with the best Thanksgiving holiday side dishes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
